definition: to crack down on illegal activities/to fight organized crime
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: He said he has resumed work, the domestic anti-crime anti-drug.
sentences.chinese: 他说，他已恢复工作，进行国内扫黑扫毒。

definition: to crack down on illegal activities/to fight organized crime
to crack down on/to take severe measures against
Rectification or Rectifying incorrect work styles, Maoist slogan/cf Rectification campaign 整風運動|整风运动, army purge of 1942-44 and anti-rightist purge of 1957
dark road/criminal ways/the underworld/see also 白道[bai2 dao4]
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down (the perpetrator of a crime, an escaped prisoner etc)
strict/serious/solemn/dignified/to tidy up/to clean up/to purge/to adjust
to hunt and arrest (fugitives)/to track down and arrest/a manhunt
Rectification campaign/political purge/cf Mao's 1942-44 campaign at Yanan, and his 1950 and 1957 anti-rightist purges
